Standard normal array.

Source: R/hoff_functions.R
rsan.Rd

Generate an array of iid standard normal variables.

rsan(dim)

Arguments

dim

a vector of positive integers.

Details

This functions generates an array of dimension dim filled with iid standard normal variables.

Author

Peter Hoff.

Examples

tensr:::rsan(c(5,4,3))
#> , , 1
#> 
#>            [,1]       [,2]       [,3]        [,4]
#> [1,]  0.8203942 -2.3264015 -0.5239302  1.83747193
#> [2,]  0.6233625  0.9993367 -0.4756755 -0.95377338
#> [3,]  0.2341128  0.7202906  0.7314658 -1.21195581
#> [4,] -0.2829737 -0.9097333  0.1654767  1.28235404
#> [5,]  0.6720944  0.5726459  1.1078692 -0.06693132
#> 
#> , , 2
#> 
#>            [,1]        [,2]        [,3]       [,4]
#> [1,]  0.4889747 -0.32164654 -0.09479798 -1.0006607
#> [2,]  0.4361023 -1.78276841 -0.13362905 -1.5673246
#> [3,] -2.3871727 -0.56374016 -1.62623286  1.7918457
#> [4,] -1.7982161 -0.05575612 -0.91610616  1.3840438
#> [5,] -1.7505363  0.72316348 -1.88163965  0.2704318
#>

#>
